name: dividedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not united because people have different opinions or want different things: Our nations cannot afford to act dividedly in the face of this great threat. The party became dividedly sceptical about Europe under her leadership.
separately: He said that the mind cannot act dividedly from the body.
More examplesFewer examplesThey responded dividedly according to their individual interests.It was declared that these were common benefits to be shared by all and not enjoyed dividedly.
